imdb.plot outline: This program tells the story of communications in our country from the pre-Hispanic era up until the turn of the 20th century. This is the tale of thousands of Mexicans joining forces in order to become closer to the rest, thus forging a national identity.
imdb.title: Historia de las Comunicaciones y Transportes en México, La Construcción de México
akas: Historia de las Comunicaciones y Transportes en México, La Construcción de México (Mexico)
plot: This program tells the story of communications in our country from the pre-Hispanic era up until the turn of the 20th century. This is the tale of thousands of Mexicans joining forces in order to become closer to the rest, thus forging a national identity.::Clío TV
